Class DataListViewer

java.lang.Object
  com.extjs.gxt.ui.client.util.Observable
      com.extjs.gxt.ui.client.viewer.Viewer<StructuredContentProvider>

              com.extjs.gxt.ui.client.viewer.DataListViewer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Checkable, SelectionProvider
public class DataListViewer
extends StructuredViewer
implements Checkable

A concrete viewer based for a List.

See Also:
